entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a technology company providing software services and hosted applications to its end customers through various programs.

entities.name: SATYA NADELLA
entities.description: Satya Nadella is the Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer at Microsoft. He joined the company in 1992 and has held various positions, including Executive Vice President of Cloud and Enterprise.

entities.name: JUDSON ALTHOFF
entities.description: Judson Althoff is the Executive Vice President and Chief Commercial Officer at Microsoft. He joined the company in March 2013 and has served in various roles, including the President of Microsoft North America.

entities.name: CHRISTOPHER C. CAPOSSELA
entities.description: Christopher C. Capossela is the Executive Vice President, Marketing and Consumer Business, and Chief Marketing Officer at Microsoft. He has been with the company for over 28 years and has held various marketing leadership roles.

entities.name: KATHLEEN T. HOGAN
entities.description: Kathleen T. Hogan is the Executive Vice President of Human Resources at Microsoft. She joined the company in 2003 and has served in various roles, including Corporate Vice President of Microsoft Services.

entities.name: AMY E. HOOD
entities.description: Amy E. Hood is the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer at Microsoft. She joined the company in 2002 and has held various finance-related positions, including Chief Financial Officer of the Microsoft Business Division.

entities.name: BRADFORD L. SMITH
entities.description: Bradford L. Smith is the President and Chief Legal Officer at Microsoft. His role involves overseeing the company's legal affairs.

entities.name: CHRISTOPHER D. YOUNG
entities.description: Christopher D. Young is the Executive Vice President of Business Development, Strategy, and Ventures at Microsoft.

entities.name: STARBUCKS CORPORATION
entities.description: Starbucks Corporation is a global coffee company and coffeehouse chain. Satya Nadella serves on its Board of Directors.

entities.name: ALASKA AIR GROUP, INC.
entities.description: Alaska Air Group, Inc. is an airline holding company. Kathleen T. Hogan serves on its Board of Directors.

entities.name: 3M CORPORATION
entities.description: 3M Corporation is a multinational conglomerate corporation. Amy E. Hood serves on its Board of Directors.

relationships.relationship_description: Satya Nadella is the Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer at Microsoft.
Judson Althoff is the Executive Vice President and Chief Commercial Officer at Microsoft.
Christopher C. Capossela is the Executive Vice President, Marketing and Consumer Business, and Chief Marketing Officer at Microsoft.
Kathleen T. Hogan is the Executive Vice President of Human Resources at Microsoft.
Amy E. Hood is the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer at Microsoft.
Bradford L. Smith is the President and Chief Legal Officer at Microsoft.
Christopher D. Young is the Executive Vice President of Business Development, Strategy, and Ventures at Microsoft.
Satya Nadella serves on the Board of Directors of Starbucks Corporation.
Kathleen T. Hogan serves on the Board of Directors of Alaska Air Group, Inc.
Amy E. Hood serves on the Board of Directors of 3M Corporation.
